def.dt: :something that indicates or fixes a limit or extent
:a region of retarded fluid near the surface of a body which moves through a fluid or past which a fluid moves
mountain 13,140 feet (4005 m) SW Nevada in White Mountains; highest in state

entry.et: K (alternative for C as abbreviation for Cretaceous) + Tertiary

def.dt: :the transition between the Cretaceous and Tertiary periods of geologic time characterized by a mass extinction of many forms of life including the dinosaurs
